messages.content: how do you play Yars' Revenge

To play Yars' Revenge, you use a joystick to control the space ship in the game. You move the joystick in the direction of the enemies to shoot them and avoid their shots. You can also pick up power-ups to increase your firepower and shields.

Direct indexing uses an offset value stored in a register to directly access an item within an array. Indirect indexing uses an offset value stored in a register to access an array itself. This offset is used to calculate the address of the item within the array which is then retrieved. As an example, in the 6502 architecture, the instruction LDA (‘array’, X) will load the value at the array location specified by the value in the X register. This can be used to either directly or indirectly access a value within an array.
